critique: The document is a formal order related to civil service rules and appointments within the Bureau of Fisheries. It outlines the conditions under which students can be appointed to positions involving scientific fishery investigations. The language is formal and legalistic, with no explicit emotional expression. Therefore, the initial scores for all emotions are set to 1, indicating a neutral emotional tone. After further consideration, the formal and legal nature of the document suggests that there is no room for emotions. The revised scores remain at 1 for all emotions.
